name: moodio
description: A music companion app that tracks your mood and provides personalized recommendations

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:clean: npm run kill-ports && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend

author: Moodio Team
